from IPython import display

fig0 = plt.figure(0)
fig0.set_size_inches(5,6)

for block_index in range(0, block_num):
    energy = get_energy()

    ax = plt.gca(projection="polar")
    ax.clear()
    ax.set_title("block: %d/%d" % (block_index, block_num), pad=20)
    ax.plot(np.linspace(-np.pi, np.pi, c.az_num), energy[:, c.ref_el_index])

    display.clear_output(wait=True)
    display.display(plt.gcf())

plt.close()
plt.close()
